name: Dave Joyce
tweet_text: An inherent imbalance of power exists b/t an officer & detainee, therefore there is no situation in which #consent could be distinguished from coercion. Bad actors in law enforcement can't be allowed to claim consent as a viable defense against sexual assault or rape accusations.

tweet_text: #THREAD: While it's illegal in #Ohio, federal #LawEnforcement officers can claim a sexual encounter with someone in their custody was consensual. This is also the case with police officers in numerous other states. This is a very dangerous loophole and it must be closed.
